forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some passing clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. ESE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
